name: OverBeat
description:
OverBeat is a small game made in a short time by 5 student in Game design.
It's a shoot'em up game based on a rythmn gameplay.

"Overheat" was our original theme and only limitation. We integrated this theme with an overheat bar and by filling the screen with a lot of information.

Thanks to Oscar Rodríguez and Soundscape Studio for the music used.

(Credits in game)
